title: Want T204 Johnson.  Trade/sell, T204 M. Brown, T206 W. Johnson
author: scomeau

posts.post_title: Want T204 Johnson.  Trade/sell, T204 M. Brown, T206 W. Johnson
posts.post_content:
I would prefer some kind of trade if it makes sense.

I have a nice T204 Mordecai Brown PSA 6.  But I'd rather upgrade it to a Johnson.

I also have a nice SCG 40 (3) T206 Walter Johnson portrait – I could argue higher…

Anyway, I would like to parlay those two or some combo into a Johnson upgrade.  Of course, I would also agree to a multi-step process if it was right.

Since the T204 Brown infrequently sells in that condition, I am not sure of its value, but I do see one that recently went for $5,500 or so.  Don’t know if that was high, avg, or low.  The T206 Johnson is probably somewhere between $1,000 and $1,500 (optimistic!).

That means that the T204 Johnson would want to be a nice 3 or 4 to be roughly compatible.  I think...

[url]scomeau@spantech.com[/url]

It must either be graded by the big 3 or I must first have it examined for correctness.  Thanks.
